```{r}

library(gt)
library(tidyverse)

ips <- read_csv("datasets/ips_for_workshop.csv") %>%
        mutate(Name = str_c(First, Last, sep = " ")) %>%
        # mutate(Dataset = rep(c("A","B"), 10))
        select(-c(First,Last))

ips %>% gt() %>% opt_stylize(style = 6, color = 'gray') %>% cols_align(align = "left")
```
